item.title: Trump’s Next Challenge: Confirming His Cabinet Picks
item.description: A fair share of nominees with conventional GOP backgrounds could glide through the Senate, but others are bracing for fireworks.

item.title: As Midnight Strikes, Garland Releases Jack Smith’s January 6 Report on Trump
item.description: And the media were ready to amplify the proclamation that Trump ‘would have been convicted.’

item.title: To Rethink Government, DOGE Must Unshackle AI within Government
How to Pay for Greenland
item.description: Lacking the historical reasons behind the Alaska Purchase, we would need to get creative to acquire Greenland today.

item.title: The Right Way to Reform High-Skilled Immigration
item.description: We can bring in top talent from abroad without creating perverse incentives to game the system or undercut American workers.
